ProjectTemplate.Title: IO Tag Bus Module with Editor Node
ProjectTemplate.Description: Creates a tag bus module from a template, including an editor node, targeted to aid in the development of new IO modules. For example, select this template if you wish to make a scan engine or ethernet/ip module.
ProjectTemplate.LocationPath: tag bus configurable plugin module/io plugin

ProjectTemplate.Title: User Control Module
ProjectTemplate.Description: Creates a sample Tag Bus Module project containing an editor class.
ProjectTemplate.LocationPath: tag bus configurable plugin module/user control module
